website_summaries.verdict: A remarkably inexpensive planner full of unique and useful features.
pros: Interior pockets on front and back covers
Yearly overview for calendar and goals
Available template for hourly schedule during week
Things to do, addresses, and forward-planning pages
cons: Some issues with pages fraying after heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using agenda since high school. This is the perfect size to fit in a large purse or bag, tabs on the side or strong and havent fallen off. have pages for notes, to do lists, and side pockets of the front and back cover (very convenient) nice details in the days with holidays such a Halloween has a little pumpkin water mark.
customer_reviews.author: KaylaLPierce

customer_reviews.title: Not useful
customer_reviews.text: This does not have the whole year!!!! I started writing in it and realized it wasn’t a whole year. I couldn’t send it back. I threw it away 😩
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RETURNED
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with a BENT Spiral and BENT back cover. The spiral was so bent that I could not turn the pages. The overall appearance of the Planner was okay. If I would have seen the item in person, I would not have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Kirstie

customer_reviews.title: Best planner!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Bloom planner that I've bought, and I absolutely love it! Perfect size to fit in my purse, and helps me organize everything I need to do in one place!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Academic Planner
customer_reviews.text: In love with this planner it’s just like the photo. Theirs a lot of space to write your homework done.
customer_reviews.author: Loveliz Joa

customer_reviews.title: Five stars even after receiving a misnumbered planner
customer_reviews.text: I loved everything about this planned until I started to flip through and noticed that half of the months are not correctly numbered. With that I contacted the company and now they are sending me a new one within a day. Very pleased with the service.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: The cover is flexible and I wanted a hard one but it's my bad because its written
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described and as shown in the video. The cover is flexible and I wanted a hard one but it's my bad because its written.
customer_reviews.author: Shahar A.

customer_reviews.title: so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy to carry and lightweight it is while still being really functional- very trendy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a better quality planner instead
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and had it shipped directly to recipient. Just found out the spirals were bent so she is unable to use the planner effectively. Also, feels cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore this planner, and I get compliments on it often! The print is very pretty, and it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: So worth it
customer_reviews.text: The marbled gold planner is super cute. Has motivational quotes and an organization for all your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Lot of room to write and has two pockets which I needed. Fits in purse nicely
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice planner
customer_reviews.text: Very nice layout. Works well but the cover is a little flimsy. For the price very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Raechel Valerius

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I use my calendar everyday and I am able to keep track of my monthly budget with this organizer. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Leaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: It's My Second Bloom Daily Planner - A++
customer_reviews.text: This planner is the right size with the right amount of space. I had purchased another brand for this school year but had to go back for Bloom. They're practical and pretty, too.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Love the quotes. I am unorganized but this has really helped me.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Loved the style of the planner. Helps organize plans for the day. Best used for homework//school
customer_reviews.author: armin b.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The planner looks great! Has plenty of room for notes and so forth. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy I.

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Organized
customer_reviews.text: I use it for school. Very helpful and it looks very nice. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: cassie dorton

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a little bigger but overall I love it!
customer_reviews.author: yusra

customer_reviews.title: For my girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: After many months of searching by my girlfriend and I for the PERFECT planner, we have found it. She has been wanting the perfect planner that is not only stylish on the outside, but functions in a way that is easily accessible for day-to-day entries while still keeping that cute appeal on the inside as well. I would look for hours for her on many websites trying to the find the perfect combination of function and style. Needless to say, we have found the ONE. We are just so happy with this choice of planner! It does everything the description explains and more! Could not have asked for a better planner! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Adam Newport

customer_reviews.title: Keeps
customer_reviews.text: Helps me keep all those important appointments and dates in one place so I won’t easily forget.
customer_reviews.author: kim

product_meta.title: bloom daily planners 2018-2019 Academic Year Day Planner - Monthly and Weekly Calendar Book - Inspirational Dated Agenda Organizer - (August 2018 - July 2019) - 6" x 8.25" - Marble
feature_bullets: DIMENSIONS: 6" wide (with binding) x 8.25" tall x .4" thick, 10 oz. Academic planner 2018-2019
2 page monthly overview spreads and spacious weekly views run academic year, August 2018 through July 2019 -- 365 days!
365 days! Premium features include monthly tabs, 100gsm bright white paper, metal lay-flat spiral binding, and front and back inside pockets
Sturdy, lightweight covers made from thick cardstock with matte film lamination are flexible yet durable

Packed with extra resources to help you BLOOM this year: personal mission statement prompt and yearly goal setting page, weekly scheduling templates, major holidays list, 7 notes pages, 4 contacts/address book pages, inspirational quotes, monthly reflection questions, and more!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars74 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
